Question
========

You sell contents insurance. If a burglary occurs, € 5000 to be paid out. Research shows that there are 26.9 burglaries per 1,000 households. What does your insurance have to cost to make a profit?

Answerlist
----------

* Less than €134.50
* More than € 134.50
* Less than € 5000
* More than € 5000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Less than €134.50: Incorrect
* More than € 134.50: Correct
* Less than € 5000: Incorrect
* More than € 5000: Incorrect
